entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Can not reference RCL assets using assembly name #35587
  • Web.config transformations not working when deploying Blazor WebAssembly application to Production and Staging Environments #35584
  • Blazor: InputFile out of memory #35583
    area-blazor, Needs: Attention :wave:
  • VS 2022 Preview 3.1 Template creates Minimal API for Blazor Server Hosted Project #35577
    area-runtime

Closed

  • Pack of .NET 5 RazorClassLibrary is broken when .NET 6 Preview 7 is installed #35568
    question, area-blazor, :heavy_check_mark: Resolution: Answered, Status: Resolved, feature-static-web-assets
  • RedirectToAction should support relative paths #33568
    area-mvc, Needs: Attention :wave:, Discussions
  • Autorebuild & refresh browser doesn't work for F# projects #35543
    area-mvc, :heavy_check_mark: Resolution: Answered, Status: Resolved, feature-hot-reload
  • .Net 6 Preview 7 sdk is adversely affecting npm commands #35541
    question, area-blazor, :heavy_check_mark: Resolution: Answered, feature-razor-sdk
  • Minimal APIs naming cleanup #35478
    area-runtime, api-ready-for-review, feature-minimal-actions, 6.0-rc1
  • Microsoft.Extensions.Http.Polly TaskCancelledException during retry when deadline is hit. #28383
    bug, area-runtime, feature-httpclientfactory, area-grpc, :heavy_check_mark: Resolution: Answered, Status: Resolved, Next sprint planning
  • Improve Minimal APIs support for request media types & body schema/shape #35082
    area-mvc, api-approved, feature-minimal-actions, area-web-frameworks, 6.0-rc1

Updated

  • Uint8Array created by byte[] deserialization in javascript has incorrect buffer property byteLength #35597
  • Throws MessagePack.MessagePackSerializationException when simultaneously sending same message to multiple connected clients #35595
  • Return the path in error handling #35596
  • Model binding fails with FormatException if dictionary key is numeric type and value is missing from POST #35594
  • hotreload breaks blazor webassembly with asp and user defined base path - missing blazor-hotreload.js returns 404 #35555
    Author: Migration Bot :robot:
  • Html.ActionLink() returns incorrect URL when Minimal Action with Name metadata in use #35592
  • dev-certificates on Linux -- how to get dotnet-to-dotnet comms to work? #7246
    enhancement, area-commandlinetools, feature-devcerts, severity-major, affected-medium, Backlog
  • Error in .NET 6 SDK when building a Blazor Wasm project that transitive referencing a Razor Class Library package built by .NET 5 SDK that contains static web assets #35590
  • Subclassing Startup from StartupBase throws NotSupportedException #35502
    Docs, area-runtime, feature-hosting
  • [SignalR] Provide a way for Azure SignalR to read HttpConnectionDispatcherOptions #35544
    area-signalr
  • Blazor Hosted WebAssembly, Failing to resolve the route. #35589
  • Analyzers for Minimal APIs #35528
    feature-minimal-actions, area-web-frameworks
  • asp.netcore cpu throttle in k8s cluster #29150
    area-runtime, Needs: Attention :wave:, Next sprint planning
  • Support Blazor properly for All ASP.Net Identity Scaffolded pages (i.e., not Razor Pages) #35551
    area-blazor
  • Autogenerated code can't compile in VS preview version. #35554
    Author: Migration Bot :robot:, area-razor.compiler
  • enpoints.MapRazorPages() throwing an exception. #35365
    Needs: Author Feedback, area-mvc
  • Support custom error messages for optionality via nullability feature #35501
    feature-minimal-actions, area-web-frameworks
  • Publish nightly builds to an LKG location #35457
    area-infrastructure, .NET 7-Candidate
  • What to do with Microsoft.Extensions.DiagnosticAdapter dependency #35463
    area-infrastructure
  • So, how do we manage Sessions in ASP.NET Core in 2021? #33686
    Docs, area-runtime, Discussions
  • Create 6.0 SiteExtensions package #35430
    area-infrastructure, 6.0-rc2
  • VS is slow to start making requests of Language Servers #31416
    External, investigate, blocked, area-razor.tooling, feature-razor.vs, feature-razor.textmate, 17.0-Preview4

PullRequests

Created

  • Merge from 'release/6.0-rc1' into 'release/6.0' #35588
  • Update Components to use LoggerMessage #35585
    area-blazor
  • Include source in RequestDelegateFactory missing required parameter log #35580
    area-runtime

Merged

  • Remove null check for HttpContext #35581
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 7.0-preview1
  • [release/6.0-rc1] Update dependencies from dotnet/efcore dotnet/runtime #35573
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:, 6.0-rc1
  • [release/6.0] Update dependencies from dotnet/runtime dotnet/efcore #35578
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:, 6.0-rc2
  • Improve Minimal APIs support for request media types #35082 (#35230) #35579
    Servicing-approved, 6.0-rc1
  • Minimal APIs naming cleanup #35570
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • Improve Minimal APIs support for request media types #35082 #35230
    feature-minimal-actions, area-web-frameworks, 7.0-preview1
  • [release/6.0] Update dependencies from dotnet/runtime dotnet/efcore #35539
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:, 6.0-rc2

Updated

  • RC1 Port: Add FailureReasons (#35425) #35529
    area-security, ask-mode
  • [main] Update dependencies from dotnet/runtime dotnet/efcore #35547
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:
  • [release/6.0] Update dependencies from dotnet/efcore #35593
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:
  • [SPA] Ensure spawned NPM processes are terminated when the dotnet process is ungracefully terminated #35591
    area-runtime
  • [release/3.1] Expose all references when not restoring #33197
    blocked, area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 3.1.17
  • [release/6.0-rc1] Minimal APIs naming cleanup #35576
  • [release/6.0-rc1] Add support for Results extension point #35574
    area-runtime
  • Add support for Results extension point #35571
    area-runtime
  • Update middleware that assumes UseRouting is called after them, for minimal hosting #35426
    area-runtime, area-web-frameworks
  • Don't cache CanReuse value #35575
    area-runtime
  • [release/6.0-rc1] HTTP/3: Response drain timeout #35492
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, ask-mode, 6.0-rc1
  • Add Support for `DateOnly` & `TimeOnly` for `SupplyParameterFromQuery` #35569
    area-blazor
